articles.title: Scott Morrison encourages Australians to shorten time between AstraZeneca COVID-19 vaccine doses - ABC News

articles.content:

articles.description: The departure from Bagram airbase effectively ends the United States' (and Australia's) longest war. Why is there a bunch of equipment left behind?

articles.description: RBA governor Philip Lowe says it could take years for wage pressures to build in Australia, with businesses used to having a wide pool of foreign labour to call upon.
